title: Singed... rework?
body: Not really sure where to post this, I was more wondering if Singed will ever get a rework to his kit, he's just been in a really weird place for so long, he feels like he needs a kit update. Thoughts?

replies.body:
We don't have any plans to make significant changes to Singed (almost certainly balance adjustments at some point, but none currently planned). He's got a distinct playstyle, a deep mastery curve, creates great high moments and certainly isn't a jack of all trades. He is a bit weird thematically, but not in a 'this guy's failing to deliver on his core fantasy' kind of way. 

I'm not personally convinced the root from the Fling/Mega Adhesive combo's sufficiently relevant to justify its existence on the kit, could imagine a world in which we took that out and replaced it with something a bit less niche. I don't play Singed much myself though, so I might be just unaware of a bunch of value that interaction provides.
I do have to agree with you on the Fling/MA combo, it feels really clunky when you use it. Thanks for the reply Meddler.

Id say he fails to deliver on core fantasy. In the Lore it talks about him making all sorts of cool bioweapons. going in game I though Singed was going to be like the Forsaken from World of Warcraft where he can call down super high damaging chemicals. instead i just got a guy who runs around laugh spamming. I dont like how Singed is just focused around becoming a ball of stats through his ult and passive and then being a annoying as hell guy. In teamfights youd think  that singed could use his chemicals to close off escape routes or turn a big area into gas chamber. instead he just makes a straight b-line for the ADC trying to throw them and usually he succeeds thanks to 300 armor and 4k HP. Singed while fun to play coulda def be better.

I agree, the snare combo is very situational and not so meaningful. I think Singed is fair in terms of power, but if changes are needed, I would like something that allows me to be more useful when I'm behind without buffing him in other cases. I personally struggle hard when I lose lane because I need some items to tank well and be relevant in teamfights mid game.

On the Fling/MA combo, what if you made fling into a targeted similar to viktor E or rumble ult? Target the enemy then drag mouse and release to fling them in a desired direction. Maybe something to at least try internally.

Pro
- gives better control for peeling and CC

Con
-removes the skill of positional based flinging

Maybe just make it more fluid, mainly by reducing the cast time on adhesive so I can run up to the enemy then right before casting fling I can cast adhesive and have it so that by comboing my skills that way my flinged target gets properly glued down instead of escaping as I waste a lot of time throwing glue right behind me due to the large cast time.

I would of gone out on a limb and say it should have never been implemented. You add power on  something that literally never happens. And trying to make it work adds power when it is completely inaccessible.

The W and his passive may be the only things worth touching.. the Q is way too trademark for Singed, The flip is the best part of singed, and the ult could be possibly changed as long as he gets to keep his MS buff.. Personally there would be no point in playing a running madman with chemicals if.. he cant run

Yeh I think the snare is rather pointless/doesn't happen enough to be worth the 'power budget' for it, if it has any.
Moreso than that I think he needs a new passive. Not that it's horrible. It's just boring af. Bogs down his build some where you're kinda just forced to build {{item:3110}} or {{item:3025}} and {{item:3027}}. I mean, they're good items, and good on Singed anyway cause, stats. But, just the 'yay free hp, cause..' isn't interactive at all.

I'd rather him lose the free hp, and gain something like a short shield or burst to his stats under certain circumstances. Maybe something like, if Singed is in combat with 2 or more champions for 8 seconds, he gains (stats? a shield? movespeed? ap? small amounts of everything?) every 2 seconds for the next 12 seconds. (+ a cooldown on the effect, so he can't just gain free stats forever).
But it'd be kinda interesting, Singed having an ideal window of combat being 8-20 seconds, then after that he'd either want to escape or make sure everyone is dead. Wouldn't deal well with short bursts, wouldn't deal well with extremely long fights like mundo, gnar, maokai, etc. But right in the middle he could wreak havoc.

He doesn't really need one, and his kit, whole a bit dull, is still unique. He's in a good spot balance wise and for strategic niches, and he has a great identity. Plenty of other champions need it more anyhow.

it's an older kit, but not really a dire need for a rework. Nothing in his inherently bad, or problematic that it can never be made viable. 

But I think the bigger question is, what would you replace his kit with? You still have to maintain his identity as a mobile tank, that leaves behind a poisonous trail.
Nope. Singed is just fine, really. He doesn't need a rework.

I have been playing a lot of singed lately and I have to say that he is in a very good place in this meta. He is a direct counter to a lot of the juggernaut tops we are seeing and is actually a very competitive top lane champ. 

That being said the mega adhesive is clunky but useful. I find myself using it to self gank top lane all the time. run out of sight, pop ult or ghost run into lane between other champ and his tower throw down a sticky field to slow his retreat and flip him back towards center of lane. It would be nice if the cast time of the sticky goo was shorter or didn't require me to stop moving.  

His passive is really where he is weakest. Its not really useful given the way that he is suppose to be itemized. Most people assume he needs a tear and maybe ROA to make him viable but those are both weak items on him given his ability to harass in lane if you take AP items instead. I think he would be better off with a passive that scales on number of champs infected with poison maybe?
That would go along with his lore more I think, because didn't he poison an entire Ionian village or platoon or something. I will have to go back and a read up on him again.
the only change he could use is in his Mega Adhesive.
Thanks for all the great feedback guys and gals, I am really happy that the community gave me really nice, honest answers.
